About Me

Accomplished Senior Developer with over 20 years of experience in Node.js, PHP, and Web3 technologies, seeking to leverage expertise in building scalable web applications, APIs, and deploying blockchain solutions to drive innovation in fintech and dApp technology.

Skills

  • Server Management: NGINX, MySQL, Linux CLI, server optimization, and scaling
  • Tools & Frameworks: Astro, Remix, Express.js, Git, Docker
  • Soft Skills: Problem-solving and team collaboration
  • Certifications: Stanford Online Machine Learning Course
